*Attention* Families of ECLCS,

Due to the Total Eclipse taking place Monday, August 21st from 11:54 AM to 2:43 PM in our area, to protect students from the possible harmful effects of the eclipse, students will not be released from the LCPA (High School) building until 2:45 PM.

We have determined that the safest option for our students is to delay the release of students onto buses until the eclipse has ended at 2:43. This will result in about a 15 minute delay to bus departure at the high school on Monday. Due to the way busing works in our region, this will have a trickledown effect at all schools. We anticipate that buses will arrive at K2, 3-7 and EC about 15 minutes later than normal and that, in turn, student arrival at bus stops will also be delayed by about 15 minutes.

Any further questions please reach out.
